column5: Hey all,  Heading with the family to Camp lake in huntsville on the weekend until wed.  My bro just got riggers on his boat and we want to give them a try. What should we use for lakers ? raps ? spoons ?  Can anyone recommend any other lakes in the area to try if CAMP lake doesnt produce ..  Thanks all Spiro
I fish a lake in that area.  i was nailing lakers on saturday down 50 over 100 using a williams wobbler That's been my killer lure all summer for them thus far.  Good luck man!
Nice ! whats your biggest fish this season ?
You can try Lake of Bays.  Excellent Lake Trout.  Spoons seem to do the trick.
Biggest thus far was only 66 cms.  Most things i seem to catch are within the slot of 40 to 55 cms.  So that one was a nice find for me!
